permissions: Authenticated user with API access; TransportRoutePolicy allows index and the list scope is unrestricted for non-admin users.
validation_notes: Filters near-origin-location and near-destination-location must be in the format "latitude|longitude|proximity_miles". Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180, and proximity_miles must be a positive number; all three parts must be numeric.

flags.name: --near-origin-location
flags.validation: Format: "latitude|longitude|proximity_miles"; latitude -90..90, longitude -180..180, proximity_miles > 0; all numeric.

flags.name: --near-destination-location
flags.validation: Format: "latitude|longitude|proximity_miles"; latitude -90..90, longitude -180..180, proximity_miles > 0; all numeric.
